channel.title: Social on Harecoded
channel.description: Recent content in Social on Harecoded

item.title: Dirty Twitter
item.description: Fuck! I can't believe there is a service out there that filters all the world tweets and presents only the dirtiest ones... The offender site is called Cursebird, and that is his job plus it does it well. So we all will have to watch our sayings more than ever...
